Text.Name: YGPanda
Text.Desc: Animal transformed into Yaoguai due to awakened intelligence: Panda Yaoguai

Text.Name: JYPanda
Text.Desc: Animal that has gained power without awakening intelligence: Monster Panda

Text.Name: LsPandaXian
Text.Desc: Divine Panda Xianxian is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.

Text.Name: LsPandaXiu
Text.Desc: Divine Panda Xiuxiu is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.
